availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Florida native. Married to Mary E. Rousseau in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 4, 1864. First lieutenant in the 14th United States Volunteer Infantry Regiment on May 14, 1861. First lieutenant and captain in the 5th United States Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from June 22, 1861, to c1863. Colonel of the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from February 1, 1863. Brevetted brigadier general on June 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482710, p. 26-27.
